name: Glitched Sokoban
description:
A fork of tutorials for Löwe https://simplegametutorials.github.io/love/sokoban/ (public domain)

I'm learning the language and experimenting with external libraries.

I created tiles for the game and added some shaders to make it prettier.

101 levels and 12 combinations of different shaders, colours and effects.

Keys: Arrows to move

R to repeat level

N to skip levels
